gcci.text: H100 allocations are easing as supply normalizes across US-East clusters, though 2025 capex constraints keep premium pricing sticky.

gtpi.text: Distillation and aggressive API price cuts compress input costs toward $1.28/M tokens, intensifying model competition.

gagl.text: At 150 TWh annual load, grid strain is rising; nuclear baseload is becoming critical for sustainable GW-scale deployments.

aipi.text: Macro sentiment is tempered by capex intensity and power bottlenecks, signaling a measured but durable growth trajectory.
